data.name: RPG Maker MZ - KR Urban Modern Tileset - Interiors
data.detailed_description:
Do your modern houses need a makeover? Shops need a renovation? This tileset is ready to go to work.

Make tons of new interiors with this tileset! Crammed full of details so you can make plenty of cool modern interiors like:

Houses
Office spaces
Prisons/Police Stations
Gyms
Game Room/Arcades
Barber Shop/Beauty Salons
Jewelry Stores
Fashion Clothing Stores
Grocery Stores
Convenience Stores
Liquor Stores
Bakeries
Coffee Shops
Bookstore/Libraries
Buffet-Style Restaurants
Fast Food Restaurants
Fancy Restaurants
Pubs
Garage/Shops (for your house)
Garages (for your mechanic)
Hardware Stores
Anything else you can dream up!

Includes 13 animated doors!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
